`,(0,s.jsxDEV)(t.pre,{children:(0,s.jsxDEV)(t.code,{className:"language-ts:sitemap.config.ts",children:`import fs from 'fs';\r
import { getAllPosts } from './src/libs/post';\r
\r
async function createSiteMap() {\r
  const siteUrl = 'https://lavinoys.github.io';\r
  const posts = getAllPosts();\r
\r
  const sitemap = \`<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>\r
<urlset xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns:news="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-news/0.9" xmlns:xhtml="http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml" xmlns:mobile="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-mobile/1.0" xmlns:image="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">\r
<url><loc>\${siteUrl}</loc><changefreq>daily</changefreq><priority>0.7</priority></url>\r
\${posts\r
  .map(\r
    (post) =>\r
      \`<url><loc>\${siteUrl}\${post.slug}</loc><changefreq>daily</changefreq><priority>0.7</priority></url>\`,\r
  )\r
  .join('\\n')}\r
</urlset>\`;\r
\r
  await fs.promises.writeFile('public/sitemap.xml', sitemap, {\r
    encoding: 'utf-8',\r
  });\r
}\r
\r
void createSiteMap();
